name: v3.2.2
body:
# Fast DDS v3.2.2

This release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Fix `related_sample_identity` handling in RPC for ROS 2 request messages (#5760)
1. Fix compilation in Windows using MinGW compiler (#5663)
3. Fix a crash error in `XMLDynamicParser.cpp` due to `wstring_builder` being created as `nullptr` (#5761)

This release includes the following **improvements**:

1. Add support for sequence types in `IDLParser` (#5763)
1. Improve efficiency of Discovery Server routines (#5764)
1. Always copy `type_information` in `ReaderProxyData` and `WriterProxyData` copy constructors (#5766)
1. Add Fast DDS v2.6.10 to supported releases (#5772)

This release includes the following **ci management updates**:

1. Force using asio from thirdparty in MacOS CI (#5769, #5776)
1. Update 2.6.x weekly Ubuntu image to Ubuntu 22.04 (#5770)

PRs in merged order:
#5760, #5663, #5761, #5769, #5770, #5776, #5763, #5764, #5766, #5772, #5786

name: v2.6.10
body:
# Fast DDS v2.6.10

According to our [release support guidelines](https://github.com/eProsima/Fast-DDS/blob/master/RELEASE_SUPPORT.md#release-support) the `v2.6` minor only receive patches for critical issues and security fixes.

This release includes the following **critical fixes**:

1. Fix [CVE-2025-24807](https://www.cve.org/CVERecord?id=CVE-2025-24807)
1. Discard changes with big key-only payload and no key hash (#5276)
1. Update types regeneration script homing path (#5107)
1. Fix topic interference on liveliness_changed status (#5046)

This release includes the following **improvements**:
  
1. Add `unsigned` specification to literals (#5174)
1. Update commercial support section in README (#5324)
1. Update `sqlite` from 3.36.0 to 3.47.2 (#5538)

This release includes the following **ci management updates**:

1. Exclude flaky tests when compiling without security (#5037)
1. Fix python version in sanitizers CI (#5077)
1. Fix windows CI and add vanilla build step in ubuntu CI (#5099)
1. Update submodules when cloning Fast DDS on CI (#5572)
1. Add Ubuntu weekly CI (#5068)
1. Allow running CI on external contributions (#5290)
1. Use `eProsima-CI` action to install `Qt` (#5194)
1. Add references to new nightly jobs per supported branch in README (#5301) 

PRs in merged order:
#5037, #5077, #5099, #5068, #5174, #5107, #5290, #5194, #5301, #5276, #5324, #5046, #5538, #5572, #5771

name: v3.2.0
body:
# Fast DDS v3.2.0

This minor release includes the following **features**:

1. Implementation of `get_matched_publication/subscription()` `DataReader/Writer` API (#5312)
1. Extended incompatible QoS for monitor service (#5385)
1. Transform locators using new `machine_id` PID (#5382)
1. New property to select preferred key agreement algorithm (#5413)
1. Parse IDL file on `DynamicTypeBuilderFactory::create_type_w_uri` (#4943, #5567, #5559, #5640)
1. Fast DDS `ROS2_EASY_MODE` (#5548, #5689, #5593, #5665)
1. Add `RPC` related interfaces (#5687)
1. Extend `QoS` in discovery data (#5712) 

---

This release includes the following **improvements**:

**Transport:**

1. Check if SHM transport is disabled in `LARGE_DATA` modes (#5355)
1. Allow domain names (DNS) when parsing TCP locators XML elements (#5429)
1. Improve `Blackbox` TCP tests suite (#5467) 
1. Decouple transport receivers creation using unique network flows (#5583)
1. Improve `max_allocations` calculation on SHM transport (#5659) 
1. Improve SHM configuration on large data transports (#5725)

**Discovery:**

1. Improve `PDPClients` initialization (#5459)
1. Make the machine id the physical_data host info (#5592)
1. Filter interested readers on `PDP` writer (#5604)
1. Make `*ProxyData` inherit from `*BuiltinTopicData` and refactor it (#5699)
1. Flow controller configuration for built-in endpoints (#5680)

**Security:**

1. Improve `OpenSSL` lifecycle handling (#5384, #5646)
1. Use correct algorithm strings on PermissionsToken and IdentityToken (#5450)
1. Log any errors before `cancel_init()` (#5530) 
1. Add test for security initialization error (#5550)

**Tests:**

1. Add test for a union using an alias with scope (#5330)
1. Tests for regression test: fix sequence of alias of primitives inside modules (#5350)

**Tools and examples:**

1. Add `-v` or `--version` to CLI command tool (#5401)
1. Enable `Datasharing` segments clean from CLI (#5549)
1. Update examples CMakeList to force default `CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE` (#5360)
1. Update Benchmark example (#5460)
1. Remove `SHM` option from discovery server example (#5696)

**Documentation:**

1. Roadmap update (#5412) 
1. Update latest notes from `2.10.x` to `2.10.6` (#5407)
1. Update RELEASE_SUPPORT after v2.14.4 release (#5458)
1. Set `3.0.x` as EOL (#5667)
1. Update RELEASE_SUPPORT after 3.0.2 release (#5656)
1. Correct examples on README (#5424) 
1. Warn about `XTypes` in Fast DDS v3 (#5601)

**Other:**

1. Rename `RTPSParticipantImpl.h` to `RTPSParticipantImpl.hpp` (#5356)
1. Update `sqlite` from `3.36.0` to `3.47.2` (#5526)
1. Add modules support to `idl_serialize` (#5691) 

**Release management:**

1. Add replace tag to package.xml (#5608)
1. Prepare for Release `v3.2.0` (#5503, #5720, #5681, #5515, #5715)

**Github CI management:**

1. Add Debug CI to master nightly job (#5402) 
1. Run examples in Windows CI (#5397, #5480)
1. Update submodules when cloning Fast DDS on CI (#5558)
1. Split Windows nightly tests using name filter regex (#5498)
1. Add missing `psutil` python module in sanitizers ci (#5706)

---

This release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Fix CVE-2025-24807
1. Remove unused code (#5351)
1. `SecurityManager` fixes (#5329, #5386) 
1. Fix destruction data-race on participant removal in intra-process (#5034)
1. Address `XMLDynamicParser` regression (#5383, #5499, #5565, #5688) 
1. Fix assertion deleting a `DataWriter` configured with persistent and flow controller (#5364)
1. Fix comparison in `is_update_allowed()` (#5414)
1. Fix build with `-Werror=template-id-cdtor` (#5341)
1. Fix commercial support link (#5431) 
1. Fix `cmake` generator evaluation (#5435)
1. Fix reach of maximum buffers in `asio::send_to` (#5466) 
1. Fix unique network flows with TCP transports (#5461)
1. Fix `tsan` potential deadlock between `StatefulWriter` and `FlowController` (#5432)
1. Fix Discovery CLI Tool in Windows (#5493) 
1. Arithmetic overflow in fragment size calculations (#5464)
1. Fix double-locking issue in `DataSharingListener` (#5468)
1. Fix `EDP` reliability timings (#5540)
1. Handle socket buffer size setting when system's maximum exceeded (#5527)
1. Fix log category name macro collision in `MacOS` (#5585)
1. Reliable volatile change dropped when all history `acked` (#5606)
1. Increase 'max_blocking_time' for services in `Easy Mode` (#5617)
1. Unacknowledged sample removed in `KEEP_ALL` mode (#5618)
1. Fix System Log error infinite loop when setting thread affinity (#5611)
1. Support compiler `MSYS2-MinGW` (#5600)
1. Fix python warning in `shm` CLI tool (#5627) 
1. Fix error handling logic in `try_setting_buffer_size` (#5631)
1. Remove repeated header include and fix log (#5419)
1. Flush logs in `CliDiscoveryManager` destructor (#5673)
1. Fix cleanup race condition with exclusive and shared lock files (#5319)
1. Fix assertion on `OutputTrafficManager` (#5704)
1. Fix `several_writers_on_unack_sample_removed` flaky test (#5716)

---

PRs in merged order:
#5336, #5339, #5351, #5312, #5330, #5356, #5034, #5329, #5355, #5350, #5360, #5383, #5364, #5385, #5386, #5384, #5407, #5382, #5402, #5401, #5414, #5341, #5397, #5424, #5431, #5413, #5429, #5435, #5412, #5458, #5466, #5467, #5450, #5461, #5480, #5432, #5460, #5503, #5459, #5493, #5464, #5515, #5499, #5468, #5526, #5530, #4943, #5540, #5527, #5550, #5558, #5567, #5549, #5498, #5565, #5583, #5548, #5585, #5601, #5608, #5606, #5617, #5618, #5592, #5611, #5600, #5627, #5631, #5640, #5646, #5656, #5604, #5419, #5593, #5665, #5667, #5659, #5668, #5681, #5673, #5319, #5696, #5706, #5699, #5704, #5689, #5687, #5680, #5716, #5712, #5720, #5691, #5725, #5715, #5722

name: v3.0.1
body:
# Fast DDS v3.0.1

This release includes the following **improvements**:

1. Set string arguments as const references (#5179)
1. Improve resilience against clock adjustments (#5018, #5213)
1. Make Fast DDS build compatible with `GCC 9` (#5178)
1. Use eProsima-CI action to install Qt (#5186)
1. Update `Fast CDR` submodule to `v2.2.4`(#5218)
1. Regenerate types with `Fast DDS Gen v4.0.1` (#5223)

This release includes the following **fixes**:

1. Secure simple participants with `initialpeers` over TCP match (#5071)
1. Register also the minimal created from the received complete `TypeObject` in the `TypeLookupService`(#5181)
1. Fix issue with exclusive ownership and unordered samples (#5182)
1. Fix compilation error in Ubuntu 24.04 (#5217)
1. Correct iterator increment after erasing elements in `connected_servers_list` (#5226)
1. Fix request reply example isolated build (#5236) 


PRs in merged order:
#5071, #5179, #5018, #5178, #5181, #5186, #5213, #5182, #5218, #5217, #5223, #5226, #5227, #5236, #5240

name: v3.0.0
body:
# Fast DDS v3.0.0

This release includes the following **API** breaks:

1. XTypes refactor (#4042, #3974, #4496, #4497, #4190, #4368, #4640, #4240, #4712, #4626, #4746, #4901, #4874, #4969, #4970, #4985, #5000, #4780, #4787, #5092, #4768, #5091)
    * Regenerated IDL files with types header-only fastddsgen version (#4042)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicType`` (#4190)
    * Implementation of ``TypeLookup`` listeners (#4240)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicTypeBuilderFactoryImpl::create_type_w_type_object`` (#4368)
    * Re-implementation of ``TypeObjectRegistry`` and ``TypeObjectUtils`` classes (#3974)
    * Partial implementation of X-Types1.3 (#4640)
    * Structure ``DynamicType`` inheritance from ``TypeObject`` (#4712)
    * Automatic ``TypeObject`` representation registration for ``DynamicTypes`` (#4746)
    * Refactor ``TypeObjectRegistry`` (#4874)
    * Fix proxy block in ``TypeLookup`` service (#4901)
    * Added Annotation dependencies (#4497)
    * Dynamic language binding tests (#4626)
    * Improve X-Types interoperability (#4985)
    * Only signed integers are allowed in Dynamic Language Binding enumerations (#4969)
    * Refactor XML Parser to return ``DynamicTypeBuilder`` instead of ``DynamicType`` (#4970)
    * Make more flexible ``EDP::valid_matching`` with ``TypeInformation`` (#5000)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicData`` to JSON serializer (#4780)
    * Implementation of ``DynamicType`` to IDL serializer (#4787)
    * Fixes for indirect hashes dependencies (#4496)
    * Add missing ``DynamicType`` includes (#5092)
    * Add new tests for testing new key hash calculation according to DDS-XTypes 1.3 (#5091)
    * Support ``Type-Lookup`` Service with new new GUID-less Discovery Server (#4768)
1. Migration from RTPS to DDS (#4288, #4270, #4269, #4518, #4872, #4898, #4962, #4930, #5065)
    * Migrate fastrtps namespace to fastdds (#4898)
    * Migrate classes from ``include/fastrtps`` to ``include/fastdds`` (#4518)
    * Remove ``include/fastrtps`` (#4930)
    * Migrate ``fixed_size_string`` file from fastrtps to fastcdr (#4269)
    * Migrate ``ResourceManagement`` to rtps attributes API (#4962)
    * Remove ``RTPSParticipant`` listener overloaded callbacks (#4872)
    * Move ``Time_t`` to dds namespace and some attributes to ``xmlparser`` (#5065)
    * Migrate communication tests (#4288)
    * Remove deprecated fastrtps tests (#4270)
1. Make private previously public API (#4318, #4545, #4671, #4546, #4727, #4657, #4674, #4705, #4792, #4701, #4869, #4923, #4953, #5052, #5078, #5085)
    * Make private the necessary headers from ``include/fastrtps`` (#4545)
    * Make XML Parser API private (#4318)
    * Remove all redundant headers from ``include/fastrtps`` (#4546)
    * Make RTPS messages headers private (#4657)
    * Make RTPS reader implementations private (#4674)
    * Make RTPS writer impl private (#4869)
    * Make security private (#4792)
    * Make ``NetworkConfiguration`` private (#4671)
    * Make ``ResourceEvent`` private (#4705)
    * Make ``TimedEvent`` private (#4727)
    * Remove ``WriterProxyData`` from public APIs (#5052)
    * Remove ``ReaderProxyData`` from public APIs (#5078)
    * Remove ``TopicAttributes`` from public APIs and make it private in ``xmlparser`` (#5085)
    * Remove unnecessary header and make private ``SecurityException`` and ``Exception`` (#4701)
    * Make ``ChangeForReader``, ``ReaderLocator``, and ``ReaderProxy`` private (#4923)
    * Make Blackbox tests not include any private API (#4953)
1. Fastrtps package name migration to fastdds (#4251, #4500, #4576, #4963)
    * Branch-out to v3.0.0 (#4251)
    * Migrate DLL API exporter and auto linkage to fastdds (#4500)
    * Change windows file names (#4576)
    * Migrate ``fastrtps.rc`` to ``fastdds.rc`` (#4963)
1. GUIDLess Discovery Server (#4716)
1. Gather-send implementation (#4537)
1. Refactor IPayloadPool (#4892)
1. Participant discovery structures refactor (#5042)
1. Make all public headers .hpp (#4958)
1. ``const`` qualify all data related inputs in DataWriter APIs (#4960)
1. Refactor RTPS reader APIs (#4875)

1. Migrate ``BuiltinEndpoints`` defines to variables (#4851)
1. Remove ``string_convert`` header and source (#4890)
1. Update Fast DDS docs QoS examples (#4842)
1. Link SHM locator kind with Fast DDS major version (#5116)
1. Discard local SHM locators that cannot be opened (#5118)
1. Examples refactor for a more clear, homogeneous, and didactic explanation of several features (#4547, #4570, #4921, #4889, #4924, #4859, #4959, #5010, #4913, #5001, #5006, #5014, #5047, #4999, #5084, #5033, #5086, #5142, #5173)
